title: Radiant Wukong Summoner Icon Question
body:
https://na.merch.riotgames.com/media/catalog/product/cache/1/small_image/164x/9df78eab33525d08d6e5fb8d27136e95/r/a/radiant_wukong_icon_256.png
Why is there a representation of a Summoner in the bottom right, the same figure used on the Summoner's Cup...
https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/images/15/oct/summonerheader.jpg 
...and (almost) the exact same figure for the Worlds 2017 Championship icon...
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/49/ProfileIcon3006.png/revision/latest?cb=20170831200853 
...when it's not usable for the Worlds 2017 missions? If you're gonna shoehorn something that specific into the corner of a lovely icon that also says "I monetarily support Riot Games and the Worlds 2017 Championship", I don't see the reason why it's not allowed to work for missions.

replies.body: where and how was this available?

Why are you commenting on a 2 month old Help and Support post?
https://na.merch.riotgames.com/en/radiant-wukong-figure.html

That icon just wasn't included in the icons that count towards missions. There isn't exactly any specific reason as far as I'm seeing, it just wasn't included in the list since the icon itself isn't a "worlds" icon.
cool. Thanks for the reply. Have a blessed day!
